definition: aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
better a bad life than a good death (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 si3 bu4 ru2 lai4 huo2 zhe5

sentences.english: But only worth living 'cause you're born free.
sentences.chinese: 但是唯一有價值的活著的因素是你是生而自由的。

sentences.english: It moves. They are all alive.
sentences.chinese: 夜空移動著，他們都是活著的。

sentences.english: It is better to die for the Emperor than to live for yourself.
sentences.chinese: 爲你的帝皇犧牲好過爲你自己活著。

sentences.english: That itself, made him one of the current living legend of the world.
sentences.chinese: 這本身，使他一舉成爲目前活著的傳奇世界。

sentences.english: Every society honors its live conformists and its dead troublemakers.
sentences.chinese: 社會表揚活著的順服者，以及死去的叛逆者。

sentences.english: But you are the only person alive who has sole custody of your life.
sentences.chinese: 但你是唯一活著獨一保護你的生命的人。

sentences.english: Then there will be instant rapture for those believers alive, when Christ comes.
sentences.chinese: 接著，所有活著的信徒會被提到半空之中，與主相遇。

sentences.english: Whoever eats of this bread will live forever;
sentences.chinese: 人若喫這糧，就必永遠活著。

sentences.english: How small can a free-living organism be?
sentences.chinese: 一個免費活著生物體能是多小？

sentences.english: For as long as the son of Jesse lives on the earth, neither you nor your kingdom shall be established.
sentences.chinese: 耶西的兒子若在世間活著，你和你的國位必站立不住。

definition: variant of 那麼|那么[na4 me5]
a cornered dog will jump over the wall (idiom)/to be driven to desperate action
greedy for life, afraid of death (idiom); craven and cowardly/clinging abjectly to life/only interested in saving one's neck
lit. a dream of Nanke/fig. dreams of grandeur
the moth flies into the flame/fatal attraction
to throw down/to dump/to abandon/thrown down
